class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        a = []
        b = []
        cnt =0
        for i,j in points:
            a.append((i+j, cnt))
            b.append((i-j, cnt))
            cnt+=1
        a.sort()
        b.sort()
        print(a,b)
        ans = sys.maxsize
        n = len(points)
        for i in range(n):
            start = 0
            end = n-1
            while start<n and a[start][1]==i:
                start+=1
            first = a[start][0]
            while end>=0 and a[end][1]==i:
                end-=1
            second = a[end][0]
            start = 0
            end = n-1
            while start<n and b[start][1]==i:
                start+=1
            third = b[start][0]
            while end>=0 and b[end][1]==i:
                end-=1
            fourth = b[end][0]
            ans = min(ans, max(fourth-third,second-first))
        return ans
